function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal access to housing exacerbates public health crisis","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and higher mortality rates in disadvantaged communities","Mitigation":"Implement policies to ensure equal access to housing and address housing inequality","Technologies":"Data analysis for identifying vulnerable communities, public health interventions","People":"Disadvantaged communities, low-income individuals","Owner":"Government, housing policy makers"},{"Description":"Lack of scrutiny on the relationship between housing, health, and social inequality","Impact":"Limited understanding of the causal factors contributing to health disparities","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research and analysis to identify and address causal factors","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis, epidemiological studies","People":"Housing scholars, public health researchers","Owner":"Academic institutions, government research agencies"},{"Description":"Assumption of housing as a determinant of health inequality without sustained scrutiny","Impact":"Inadequate policies and interventions to address housing-related health disparities","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth research to establish causal links and inform effective interventions","Technologies":"Longitudinal studies, data analytics, public health monitoring","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Government, research institutions"}]}
